summary: This is an email from September 4, 2007, discussing coordination for an upcoming meeting on Friday (likely September 7, 2007) involving Epstein's team and possibly the FBI. The sender is seeking clarification on whether FBI presence is desired and confirming meeting times.

events.title: Meeting with Epstein's team
events.description: A meeting scheduled for Friday, September 7, 2007, involving Epstein's team. The email discusses whether FBI presence is desired at this meeting and confirms a start time of 2:00 PM.

keyFacts: An email dated September 4, 2007, discusses coordination for a meeting with Jeffrey Epstein's legal team scheduled for that Friday (September 7, 2007).
The email explicitly questions whether an FBI presence is desired at the meeting with Epstein's team, indicating law enforcement involvement or interest in the case at that time.
The meeting with Epstein's team was scheduled to start at 2:00 PM, and there is mention of a potential follow-up 'pm-meeting' with the sender's own team.
